body.p:
EXECUTIVE DEPARTMENT,
Frankfort, Ky. May 20, 1862.
Hon W. P. Fowler
Dear Sir: Smithand Ky --

Your communication is received. For the dignity of the bench for the honor of the state ^in the name of the liberty of our people^ I hope you will pay no attention to the illegal unconstitutional and tyrannical action of Capt Stacy -- Go on and hold your Courts under the laws & constitution, and do not degrade yourself, the people you repri your district or the State by appearing at Paducah to before the Military Subaltern, no matter by whose order. Each department of the government must be preserved within its legitimate sphere of action or we are lost. I will send your Communication to the President --

Copy
Letter to Hon W. P. Fowler also Telegraphic Dispatch
Sent May 20 1862
